doc.name: ImageUnpartition
doc.description: Combine subimages into a larger image. Each input subimage should have dimensions partitionColumns by partitionRows, and each output image will have dimensions imageColumns by imageRows. The input images will be placed in row-scanned order from top to bottom into the output image.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer
doc.property: The width of the input matrices.
The height of the input matrices.
The width of the input partitions.
The height of the input partitions.
